Name: Scrapnaut
About the game: / / You will be able to change the game mode to online cooperation, even if you start in single player mode. Create your own farm and produce food. Use your cooking pot and discover different types of meals. Collect the necessary resources to build your base, fix damaged items and complete quests. Build and improve your bases! Produce and store electrical energy. Be prepared for enemy raids! Each biome allows you to build various unique items. Create and improve your equipment. A good weapon and armor will help you survive, but when your opponent is much stronger than you - better run away!
